POPULATION.LABEL: Total Population
POPULATION.DESCRIPTION: Total number of people living in a specific area.

REPORTING_RATE.LABEL: Reporting Rate
REPORTING_RATE.DESCRIPTION: Proportion of actual reports to expected reports (dataset reporting rate)

PUBLIC_CARE.LABEL: Proportion Seeking Care in the Public Sector
PUBLIC_CARE.DESCRIPTION: Proportion of children under 5 with fever in the 2 weeks preceding the survey for whom advice or treatment was sought in the public sector

PRIVATE_CARE.LABEL: Proportion Seeking Care in the Private Sector
PRIVATE_CARE.DESCRIPTION: Proportion of children under 5 with fever in the 2 weeks preceding the survey for whom advice or treatment was sought in the private sector

NO_CARE.LABEL: Proportion Not Seeking Care
NO_CARE.DESCRIPTION: Proportion of children under 5 with fever in the 2 weeks preceding the survey for whom no advice or treatment was sought

INCIDENCE_ADJ_TESTING.LABEL: Incidence adjusted for Testing
INCIDENCE_ADJ_TESTING.DESCRIPTION: Number of new malaria cases adjusted for Test Positivity Rate (TPR).

INCIDENCE_ADJ_REPORTING.LABEL: Incidence adjusted for Reporting Rate
INCIDENCE_ADJ_REPORTING.DESCRIPTION: Number of new malaria cases adjusted for Test Positivity Rate (TPR) and Reporting Rate.

INCIDENCE_ADJ_CARESEEKING.LABEL: Incidence adjusted for Care Seeking Behavior
INCIDENCE_ADJ_CARESEEKING.DESCRIPTION: Number of new malaria cases adjusted for Test Positivity Rate (TPR), Reporting Rate and Care Seeking Behavior.

PF_PR_RATE.LABEL: Pf Infection Prevalence
PF_PR_RATE.DESCRIPTION: Proportion of children 2 to 10 years with Plasmodium falciparum infection at a defined year.

PF_MORTALITY_RATE.LABEL: Pf Mortality Rate
PF_MORTALITY_RATE.DESCRIPTION: Number of deaths from Plasmodium falciparum per 100,000 population during a defined year.

PF_INCIDENCE_RATE.LABEL: Pf Incidence Rate
PF_INCIDENCE_RATE.DESCRIPTION: Number of newly diagnosed Plasmodium falciparum cases per 1,000 population during a defined year.

U5MR.LABEL: Under-5 Mortality Rate
U5MR.DESCRIPTION: In the 10 years preceding the survey, the probability of a child dying before reaching the age of 5

U5_PREVALENCE.LABEL: Plasmodium U5 Prevalence
U5_PREVALENCE.DESCRIPTION: Proportion of children under 5, classified as having malaria by a Rapid Diagnostic Test (RDT)

ITN_ACCESS_SAMPLE_AVERAGE.LABEL: Insecticide Treated Net Access
ITN_ACCESS_SAMPLE_AVERAGE.DESCRIPTION: Proportion of the population with access to an Inseticide-Treated Net (ITN) if each ITN in the household were used by up to two people

ITN_USE_SAMPLE_AVERAGE.LABEL: Insecticide Treated Net Use
ITN_USE_SAMPLE_AVERAGE.DESCRIPTION: Proportion of the household population who slept the night before the survey under an Insecticide-Treated Net (ITN)

PROP_DTP1_SAMPLE_AVERAGE.LABEL: DTP1 Immunization Rate
PROP_DTP1_SAMPLE_AVERAGE.DESCRIPTION: Proportion of children aged 1 to 3, who received the first dose of Diphtheria-Tetanus-Pertussis (DTP1) vaccine

PROP_DTP2_SAMPLE_AVERAGE.LABEL: DTP2 Immunization Rate
PROP_DTP2_SAMPLE_AVERAGE.DESCRIPTION: Proportion of children aged 1 to 3, who received the second dose of Diphtheria-Tetanus-Pertussis (DTP2) vaccine

PROP_DTP3_SAMPLE_AVERAGE.LABEL: DTP3 Immunization Rate
PROP_DTP3_SAMPLE_AVERAGE.DESCRIPTION: Proportion of children aged 1 to 3, who received the third dose of Diphtheria-Tetanus-Pertussis (DTP3) vaccine

DROPOUT_DTP_1_2.LABEL: DTP1-DTP2 dropout Rate
DROPOUT_DTP_1_2.DESCRIPTION: Immunization dropout from DTP1 to DTP2

DROPOUT_DTP_2_3.LABEL: DTP2-DTP3 dropout Rate
DROPOUT_DTP_2_3.DESCRIPTION: Immunization dropout from DTP2 to DTP3

DROPOUT_DTP_1_3.LABEL: DTP1-DTP3 dropout Rate
DROPOUT_DTP_1_3.DESCRIPTION: Immunization dropout from DTP1 to DTP3

SEASONALITY_CASES.LABEL: Seasonal by Cases
SEASONALITY_CASES.DESCRIPTION: Classification of seasonal malaria transmission based on case data, used to identify areas eligible for seasonal interventions such as SMC.

SEASONALITY_PRECIPITATION.LABEL: Seasonal by Rainfall
SEASONALITY_PRECIPITATION.DESCRIPTION: Classification of seasonal malaria transmission based on rainfall trends, used to identify areas eligible for seasonal interventions such as SMC.

SEASONAL_BLOCK_DURATION_PRECIPITATION.LABEL: Length of Tansmission Season by Rainfall
SEASONAL_BLOCK_DURATION_PRECIPITATION.DESCRIPTION: Estimated number of consecutive months per year with elevated malaria transmission based on rainfall patterns.

ITN_ACCESS_RATE.LABEL: Insecticide Treated Net Access
ITN_ACCESS_RATE.DESCRIPTION: Proportion of population with access to an Inseticide-Treated Net in their Household during a defined year.

ITN_USE_RATE_RATE.LABEL: Insecticide Treated Net Use Rate
ITN_USE_RATE_RATE.DESCRIPTION: Proportion of people sleeping under an Inseticide-Treated Net, among those with access to an ITN in their household during a defined year.

IRS_COVERAGE_RATE.LABEL: Indoor Residual Spraying
IRS_COVERAGE_RATE.DESCRIPTION: Proportion of households covered with Indoor Residual Spraying during a defined year.

ANTIMALARIAL_EFT_RATE.LABEL: Treatment with Antimalarial
ANTIMALARIAL_EFT_RATE.DESCRIPTION: Proportion of malaria cases that receive effective treatment with an antimalarial medicine.
